text: The 1963 Grand Prix motorcycle racing season was the 15th F.I.M. Road Racing World Championship Grand Prix season. The season consisted of twelve Grand Prix races in six classes: 500cc, 350cc, 250cc, 125cc, 50cc and Sidecars 500cc. It began on 5 May, with Spanish Grand Prix and ended with Japanese Grand Prix on 10 November. ==1963 Grand Prix season calendar== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" |- ! Round ! Date ! Grand Prix ! Circuit ! 50cc winner ! 125cc winner ! 250cc winner ! 350cc winner ! 500cc winner ! Sidecars 500cc winner ! Only the best of five races were counted in 50cc, 350cc and 500cc championships, best of seven in 125cc and best of six in 250cc championships, while in the Sidecars, only the best of four races were counted. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%; text-align:center" |- !
